name: Stellaris Standard Pose [OpenPose]
description:
This was made as an attempt to create a pose that can generate potential portraits for Stellaris. Surprisingly, it succeeded.

I recommend keeping Control Weight on 1, and switching Ending Control Step to 0.7, as that's what worked the best for me, but feel free to experiment.
